title: Alleviation of cadmium-induced oxidative damage through application of zinc oxide nanoparticles and strigolactones in Solanum lycopersicum L.
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,2633-2654
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00796K, Paper
Vaseem Raja, Karanpal Singh, Sami Ullah Qadir, Jagpreet Singh, Ki-Hyun Kim
In this research, zinc oxide nanoparticles (ZnO NPs) are bio-synthesized using Mangifera indica leaf extract and used for reduction of cadmium (Cd) stress in tomato plants.
